title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:

Imagine sipping on a soothing cup of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea, infused with the inviting aromas of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Or, treat yourself to the sweet and indulgent taste of Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, with its blend of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos.

Our teas are carefully crafted with high-quality, all-natural ingredients, ensuring a delicious and guilt-free drinking experience. Whether you're looking to unwind after a long day or seeking a perfect accompaniment to the harvest season, our Fall Apple Teas Bundle is the perfect choice.

**Bundle Includes:**

* 36-count Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea bags
* 36-count Caramel Apple Herbal Tea bags

**Why Choose Our Teas?**

* Caffeine-free and perfect for any time of day
* Made with all-natural ingredients and no artificial flavors
* Delicious and comforting flavors to warm your heart and soul
* Eco-friendly tea bags that can be added to compost or soil

**Treat yourself or gift someone special with our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle. Order now and cozy up to the warm, comforting flavors of fall!**
